alert.note: Alert for Mendocino Coast; Northeastern Mendocino Interior; Northern Lake County; Southeastern Mendocino Interior; Southern Lake County; Southwestern Mendocino Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 13 at 3:58PM PDT until March 14 at 5:00PM PDT by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 5 PM PDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Mendocino Coast, Northeastern Mendocino Interior, Southwestern Mendocino Interior, Southeastern Mendocino Interior, Northern Lake and Southern Lake Counties. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 5 PM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Mendocino Coast; Northeastern Mendocino Interior; Northern Lake County; Southeastern Mendocino Interior; Southern Lake County; Southwestern Mendocino Interior
